import React from "react"; import Logo from "./Logo"; import Sidebar from "./SideBar"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useData } from "./Data"; // instead of importing each of the products like this import { doorBells, doorLocks, lightings, speakers, thermostats } from "./Data"; we can import all of them in one go like this import { useData } from "./Data"; const ProductForm = () => { const [productId, setProductId] = useState(""); const [submitSuccess, setSubmitSuccess] = useState(false); const formStyle = { margin: "20px", }; const inputStyle = { width: "100%", padding: "8px", margin: "5px 0", boxSizing: "border-box", }; const buttonStyle = { float: "right", height: "20px", margin: "20px", marginRight: "10px", }; const { updateProduct } = useData(); //here we can access all the products from the useData hook const handleForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const productData = { id: productId, name: productName, price: productPrice, image: `images/${type}/${productImage}`, manufacturer: productManufacturer, condition: productCondition, discount: productDiscount, type: type, }; upda(productData); setSubmitSuccess(true); }; return (

Product Type

Product

 setProduct(e.target.value)} />

Product Id

 setProductId(e.target.value)} />

Product Name

 setProductName(e.target.value)} />

Product Price

 setProductPrice(e.target.value)} />

Product Image

 setProductImage(e.target.value)} />

Product Manufacturer

 setProductManufacturer(e.target.value)} />

Product Condition

 setProductCondition(e.target.value)} />

Product Discount

 setProductDiscount(e.target.value)} />
{submitSuccess && (

Product Added Successfully

)}
); }; export default ProductForm;
